attributes.action: stop Blaby District Council from developing valuable green belt land to build 4,500 new homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed development by Blaby District Council would cater for more than 10,000 people and include schools, shops and health services. 

The homes would be built on farmland which borders Leicester Forest East, Enderby and Braunstone Town. 

People living in Blaby believe the scheme would cause gridlock on the roads and pollution problems.
